title: march 28: Jesse Owens wins the gold (with Sofía Valdés)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the career of Olympian Jesse Owens, who, as a Black track and field athlete, won four gold medals for the U.S. at the 1936 Olympics in what was then a Nazi regime in Berlin. Afterwards, she is joined by guest Sofía Valdés and talks about the 2020 “Twitch Aid” concert that raised money for victims of the coronavirus pandemic. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
